updates.title: Jeff Bezos launches massive $6.2 billion AI startup 'Project Prometheus' as co-CEO, marking his return to hands-on tech leadership in the AI space.
MCP AI agent security startup Runlayer raises $11M from top VCs to help enterprises secure their AI agents, addressing critical security concerns as AI adoption accelerates.
Sakana AI secures $135M Series B at $2.65B valuation to build Japan-focused AI models, representing one of Japan's largest AI funding rounds this year.
Google launches AI-powered 'Flight Deals' tool globally and adds new travel planning features to Search, including visual trip planning with Canvas integration.
OpenAI's Fidji Simo reveals ambitious plans to make ChatGPT significantly more useful and profitable as the company's new CEO of Applications focuses on monetization strategy.
